textBeforeTable: Remember that the measurements below are of the T-shirts and not the person wearing the T-shirt. MEASUREMENTS : width -  armpit to armpit ; length - the body length is measured in a straight line from the highest point of the shoulder at the join of the collar to the bottom opening.Shirt sizes may vary within 1 - 2 cm. PRINT: Highest quality SCREEN print – not cheap "iron-on" transfers! T-SHIRT SPECS :GILDAN HEAVY COTTON 100% high quality pre-shrunk cotton (5.4 Oz (190 g/m2) heavy weight jersey).Taped neck and shoulders, twin needle stitching, seamless collar. CONDITION: Brand new COLOR: BLACK   AVAILABLE SIZES: S,M,L,XL,2XL
textAfterTable: Serious bidders only!Payments within 7 days of the end of the action! Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges and are buyer’s responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding/buying.WE SHIP FROM BULGARIA,Europe Union. Delivery time is out of our control and we are not responsible for customs/postal delays.We ship within 3 BUSINESS DAYS of received payment. We combine shipping – additional item ships for £1.99 each.Parcel sent to destinations within UK and  Europe are usually delivered in 8 -15 days - rarely few days more.For the rest of the world this period is 15-30 days.INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING TAKES MAXIMUM 3-5 WEEKS (even LONGER around Holidays) until the item is delivered to your local Postal office!  Please check with them if they keep the item for you! Considerations for lost item will be made after at least 3 weeks of shipping date. We ship registered mail. If you have a problem with your order, please contact us to resolve the issue! Returns accepted within 7 days of the day on which the item was delivered. Item must be in the original brand new condition. Restocking fee of  £1 will be applied,
